description: Contract Killer is a 2.5D co-op beat ‘em up starring a diverse cast of angry writing utensils. Punch, snap, and clap your way through baddies and bosses in a comical campaign, clash against your friends, or survive endless swarms of corporate goons!

name: Jelly Is Sticky
description: Explore a world of colorful jelly blocks that can be deformed and stuck together. Use them in surprising, unexpected ways to build clever contraptions and solve delightful puzzles.

name: Decision: Red Daze
description: Decision: Red Daze is an action RPG with a unique mix of survival and tower defense mechanics. Explore an apocalyptic wasteland and experience the dread of a deadly new disease. The only way to save humanity from this danger is to fight back against hordes of horrifying enemies.

name: Golf Gang
description:
Golf Gang is a fast-paced, multiplayer precision racer. Balance speed with accuracy to dominate this fresh evolution of the mini-golf genre!

Up to eight players can compete to finish courses fastest and with the fewest strokes possible in hectic multiplayer action.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Swansong
description: Based on the cult role-playing world and developed by specialists in the genre, Vampire: The Masquerade – Swansong is a narrative RPG in which your every choice determines the fate of the three main characters and of the Boston Camarilla.

name: Shadow Racer
description: Master the four car elements and save the valley by exploring a cursed world, filled with battles, secrets, amazing characters, and exciting racing challenges against the best racers of the land. Will you be worthy of being the new shadow racer?

name: Eternal Threads
description: Eternal Threads is a single-player, first-person story-driven puzzle game of time manipulation, choice and consequence.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?: Deluxe Upgrade
description: The Deluxe Upgrade offers you more than 3,000 additional questions, on top of the 6,000+ questions in the basic game!

name: Viva Project
description:
Viva mobile is a non-VR compatible game where you can interact with your very own AI anime character!
It is an advanced AI simulation that can interact and respond to many of your actions in a dynamic way through inverse kinematics, complex behaviors, and currently over 200 animations. The character's mood is dynamic and responds to how you treat it. You can play with it, feed it, or just be friends with it.

name: IPL Quiz 2022 Cricket Champion
description: Fun & Educational Trivia Challenge by answering the T20 trivia questions correctly.

name: Castaways
description:
Castaways is a island survival sandbox game created by Branch.gg. The game is currently in open alpha, and you can play it immediately in your browser by going to alpha.castaways.com

You start on a raft in the middle of the ocean, with a full health bar and full food bar. As you move around and take actions, your food bar will deplete. If your food bar reaches zero, your health bar will start to decline, and you need to eat fish to restore heart.

Collect resources on your islands like coal, lava, sand, and stone to expand its size. Grow Trees and Sugar Cane to increase your resources and supplies. PVP Items and craftable, launching soon.

name: 0Hz Zero Hertz
description: Press buttons to the beat of the music while aiming and shooting in this simple but difficult skill game. Will you get through it?

name: Flyff Universe
description:
Flyff Universe is a enhanced old school MMORPG remake built on modern technology.

All of the biggest and most popular aspects of each version of Flyff have been merged into one, bringing you your very own Flyff Universe.
Experience Flyff like never before, with an all-new graphics engine. Many options are now available: Antialiasing, Post-Processing, Advanced Shaders, and more.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Pack 10 Yuga Aoyama
description: Play as Yuga Aoyama in MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Yuga Aoyama's costume.

name: Pocket Crystal League
description:
PCL is a Poke-card game, although completely different to the Official Trading Card Game. The gameplay mechanics were partially inspired by Inscryption, being pretty straightforward and easy to learn.

After choosing a starter deck, your goal is to travel through Kyoumu, challenging each of the Gym Leaders from the eight major cities in the region, building up your team to reach the ultimate goal, the Crystal League. Along the way, you'll be presented with numerous choices to expand your deck, strengthen your cards, give them unique special abilities, and battle other trainers.

The current release includes all of gens 1 and 2 (but with corresponding Fairy types). The game may be expanded with more content and generations in the future, but there are no plans currently for it. It is fully playable in its current state.

name: World Map: Crafted City Builder
description: Enjoy an exciting puzzle! An addictive game where you will have to prove your ability to fit the pieces at the right time. Be careful! The monument may collapse.

name: Ogre: Console Edition
description: Ogre is a turn-based strategy game of mechanised warfare, requiring tactical decision-making and strategic thinking. It's the official video game adaptation of the legendary tabletop wargame from Steve Jackson Games, developed by the award-winning Auroch Digital.

name: Custom Street World Tour
description: Custom Street World Tour is an easy-to-install map pack for Fortune Street and Boom Street containing over a hundred custom boards from the Custom Street Board Repository, some including custom music and backgrounds.

name: Logjam
description: Logjam is a short gay forestry sim about a burly lumberjack chopping wood on a hot summer day.

name: The Finally
description: JRPG 2D retro pixel adventure puzzle drama love sacrifice tells the story of a young man who must travel to get back to his lover. The gameplay is a walk to find information from the characters around you. to find a way to continue Walk against enemies with battle commands.

name: 69 Summon Succubus
description: 69 Summon Sucubus - is a game in which you take on the role of a succubus trainer.You have become the owner of a magic book that allows you to summon the succubus Lilith. You need to choose skills for training and complete tasks. After each workout, your succubus will get stronger.

name: Amanda's Magic Book 4: True Love
description: In this magical Match-3 game, Amanda joins forces with Charlie in order to escape from a cursted castle and a fallen in love beast to save her father and the fairy tale world.

name: RitualSummon
description: The girl "Pella", who had been doing nothing in the original world, was summoned to the Midra continent as a saint. However, she has absolutely no interest in the high-risk, low-reward work of the Holy Maiden, and she just wants to find a way to go back.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Can Touch This
description: Get some new tools and redecorate your gas station. Change walls, doors, windows and move things around. Make your own art and rival Dennis' artworks. Want to change the warehouse or the workshop? Now you can. And much, much more.

name: Knight Story
description: Black and white 2D platformer about a knight's journey.

name: Spacemancer
description: You will peek, manipulate and travel through the chaos dimensions in search of energy stabilizers to fix the messed up world.

name: Slaughter Cannon 2
description: Slaughter Cannon - Continuation of the first part of an exciting physical puzzle! In the game you will find even more exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Blocked Zona
description: Blocked Zona is a 2D shooter in which you play as a special unit mercenary who has gone to an infested area infested with zombies in search of the R-327 military chip. The fate of the world is at stake. Arm yourself with the best military weapons and go into battle!

name: Symmetry Lines
description: Simple puzzle game with symmetry and lines.

name: Wonder Pot
description: Are you tired of existing poker games? Then try Wonder Pot Texas Holdem.

name: Dolphin Hustle
description: Somewhere in the wastelands of the ocean lives a young dolphin. He likes to get high and hang out. All he does is hang out. But it so happened that the cyber Internet sucked him in. It's time to end this.

name: MyrnEscapes
description: A single player fantasy based exploration game with audio-reactive elements set to the music of Myrn's Circles EP

name: Moi Mei: Hidden Objects
description: A game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you, in the role of a young priestess Mei, will have a journey into magical space. Search for talismans and ingredients for rituals, enlist the help of cunning and greedy Voodoo spirits to save your beloved!

name: Eros Fantasy
description: Eros Fantasy is an Idle RPG game full of magic and sex. Travel through a fantastic world, meet, seduce the hottest humans, beastfolks, demon girls and mermaids!

name: Spe:x
description: You are Ilie, an Eastern European Entrepreneur who is starting a new company of building PCs. You love computers and building them since you were a kid and now you think it will be a good idea to make your family proud and start your own business with money borrowed from unconventional sources.

name: Rail Walkers
description: Rail Walker, noun, a semi autonomous rail-mounted turret attack weapon. Defend against the swarms of intelligent insects threatening your mining infrastructure. Construct rail tracks, strategically move, repair, recharge, reload and upgrade your rail walkers in the battle against these enemy waves.

name: Icemaze Cave: Skate Escape
description: Icemaze Cave: Skate Escape is a 2D puzzle game about path planning with exploration and collection elements. Skate through the icy and labyrinthine depths of Icemaze Cave. Explore the increasingly complex cave rooms and find your way across the icy floors to the exit.

name: Local Paper Small Town
description: Local Paper Small Town is a 2-player co-op puzzle game about spreading happiness around a quirky papercraft town. Team up with a friend, using a physical newspaper and VR, to discover Smalltown and its charming cast of characters by communicating and relating between both formats.

name: Ballygon
description: Tilt the stage, turn the camera, and roll your way to the goal in Ballygon, a new labyrinth marble-rolling game! Challenge over 150 stages with unique mechanics in polygonal worlds. Go ball in with Ballygon!

name: The Pest
description: Solve challenging puzzles and avoid dangerous traps of the computer defence system in this puzzle-platformer game about a tiny optimistic computer pest heading to the System's Core. Will he plunge our world into chaos, or will he have mercy? It's up to you.

name: I Am Butter
description: I AM BUTTER is an adventure story-driven platformer which you will play as a piece of butter and go on adventures in various scenarios, solving puzzles and exploring the unknown. You will encounter a variety of NPCs, talk to them during your adventure. The truth will gradually unfold.

name: Satama Puzzle
description: Satama Puzzle is a relaxing building and puzzle game where you will optimize the layout of a Port of Unloading. Each level will have three random variable scoring conditions, so it will be a new experience each time. Try to beat your score!

name: Recursive Ruin
description: Recursive Ruin is a kaleidoscopic narrative-puzzle game. Explore an infinitely fractal world of strange beauty and mind-bending physics. Inhabit a despondent artist in search of meaning and experience a bittersweet story that cascades into the surreal.

name: Predator and Wreck
description: The game is set in a space station where an unexplained explosion suddenly occurs. Without being able to counterattack, you need to escape while solving a multitude of mysterious. Be careful to not be caught by the ferocious aliens!

name: Speedrun
description: You're trapped in underground cities! Run and use your special dash movement to survive.

name: Ultimate Sonic Heroes Fighters: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cuter Kaizo World
description: Sin descripción

name: V Rising: Founder's Pack - Eldest Bloodline
description:
This pack has been created for those who want to show off some extra love for V Rising and kindly wish to support the game further. The Founder’s Pack: Eldest Bloodline rewards your support by unlocking exclusive items that will make you stand out on your vampire journey. Get three legendary shapeshift skins, exclusive castle customizations, the original soundtrack, and a bunch of great accessories to take your dark elegance to the next level.

The Founder’s Pack: Eldest Bloodline contains a shapeshifting variant for the bear, human and wolf forms, 27 Gargoyle Statues with 3 shared variant types, 6 Gargoyle Ornaments to hang off your pillars, 16 Vampire Accessories to enhance your vampiric style and V Rising's original soundtrack by Aleksandria Migova with 18 tracks.

While you have this DLC, all items unlock and become available in-game to be crafted as you become worthy of crafting equivalent equipment.

name: SA-1: Special Adventure - 1
description: A romhack for SMW with 118 exits

name: Eyeland 2
description: The second game made by Ron Lent for Playdate.

name: Time Breaker
description: Immerse yourself in the multidimensional universe of Desordre. Solve intricate puzzles, push the boundaries of 4-dimensional thinking. Get ready for a unique experience where reflection takes on a whole new dimension

name: Hell Let Loose: Tropic Fever
description:
Pack Includes:

US Jungle Frogskin Uniform for the following roles: Rifleman, Support, Medic, Sniper, Auto Rifleman, Heavy MG, Spotter, Assault, Engineer, Anti-Tank and Officer.

US Jungle Frogskin Helmet for the following roles: Rifleman, Support, Medic, Sniper, Auto Rifleman, Heavy MG, Spotter, Assault, Engineer, Anti-Tank and Officer.

name: WWE 2K22: Most Wanted Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Frog Daddy's Dash
description:
Frog Daddy Dash is a game about the time crunch of being a single, working parent. Try to scrape together some money selling mushrooms during the day, and spend your limited time as a currency at night to take care of yourself and your family.

Sometimes you will have to make hard choices as to what you'll spend your hours on. When your a single, working parent, there's never enough hours in the day.

name: V Rising: Dracula's Relics Pack
description:
Embrace your dark legacy and project your intentions of supremacy with the Dracula’s Relics pack.

Strikeout into Vardoran in iconic black, red, and gold. Don the Immortal King’s Mantle and mark yourself a commander of death with the Immortal King’s Greathelm as your battle crown. Whether on the battlefield or resting atop your extravagant throne, these colors represent a vampire with an ambition worthy of the next Dracula.

Return home to a castle worthy of the scourge of Vardoran. From throne to coffin, walls to floors, carpet runs to brilliant braziers, your castle will project regality. The royal decor will project an unmistakable air of dominance, elegance, and taste.

name: Footage 1985
description:
In February 1986, a tape was found in the former home of the killer known as the "Butcher of the Forest".

After the disappearance of some people at the scene, an investigation was launched.

Mark Henry, the dreaded murderer, has already been executed by electrocution, so there is no possibility that he is the perpetrator of further crimes.

The images you will see are from the tape found at the site and may be disturbing images...

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Prime Time
description: World Wide Launch is upon us and we could not be more excited to share Apex Legends Mobile with the world. So strap in for a brand new adventure as we introduce a new Legend to the Apex Games: Fade.

name: Cute Waifu
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Company of Heroes Collection
description:
The Company of Heroes Collection combines the critically acclaimed World War II game and its two exhilarating expansions into one fully loaded, real-time strategy package. Take command on both sides of the Battle for Normandy, mastering fast-moving combat and advanced squad-based tactics on the explosive battlefields of northern France.
In Operation Overlord, lead the US Army's Able Company during the D-Day landings, and spearhead the charge from the beaches of Normandy. Then, direct US, British and German forces alike in the Opposing Fronts and Tales of Valor expansions, with new campaigns as well as diverse new factions to command in the hugely replayable Skirmish mode.

name: Sailor Cats 2: Space Odyssey
description:
Sailor Cats embark on a new journey in space!
Looks like building a cardboard rocket wasn’t such a good idea after all because it exploded! Now all your cats are missing in space and you’ll have to find them! But don’t worry because you’ll also find lots of new friends - and marvelous creatures - along the way.

name: Furi: Modore Edition
description:
Modore Edition! The edition includes:
- Furi
- The new DLC Onnamusha to fight as the powerful Onnamusha Rider with new attacks - All content created and improvements made to the game since its launch.

name: Outward: Definitive Edition
description:
Outward: Definitive Edition delivers the ultimate experience for Outward players.

It is not just a visual overhaul, but naturally combines the new mechanics and features from Outward and both DLCs, The Soroboreans and The Three Brothers, to make it feel like a brand new experience. Beside the new weapons, dungeons and DLCs unique mechanics, you can also expect quality of life improvements. Adventurers, now is your best chance to explore the world of Aurai!

name: Trash Patrol
description:
Trash Patrol is a cooperative multiplayer game for 2-4 players. You and one or more of your friends break into a house. Your goal: Steal every item within the given time!

But be aware of the homeowner! They do not condone raccoons running around their house and trashing it! If they spot you: Run!

name: The King of fighters XV: Characters Team South Town
description: [Product Contents]Geese Howard, Billy Kane, and Ryuji Yamazaki of "Team South Town" can be used in "The King of fighters XV".

name: Astro Bandits
description: "Astro Bandits" is a classic 2D top-view arcade scrolling shooter. Earth has been attacked by aliens and you need to destroy enemy starships and to save the planet. Nice visuals and atmospheric music will immerse you in the Aerospace Forces.

name: Mythic Legends
description: Mythic Legends is a mobile strategy RPG where you gather armies of mighty champions. Battle it out in the arena to reach the top of the global leaderboard!

name: Abort, Retry, Fail
description: Abort, Retry, Fail is a top-down roguelike action adventure in which you play as a lazy programmer that has to generate his own weapon and shoot his way through hordes of enemies. Are you brave enough to help him escape from computer hell of Windows 98?

name: The Lost Dachshund
description: Your granddaughter is coming over on the ferry from the mainland. You have promised her a puppy for her birthday– a dachshund named "Peanut". But Peanut has escaped her pen and is free on the island. You must traverse the island and rescue the mischievous puppy, before your granddaughter arrives.

name: Ralph's Party RPG
description: Ralph's Party RPG is easy and fancy RPG game. Complete the game by going through all the dungeons, but be careful - there might be some enemies waiting for you. It has simple design, good music, and great levels.

name: Endrr
description: Survive the hordes of monsters as long as you can. Fight, upgrade your skills, loot equipments, die, rince and repeat.

name: Adventure Trip: London - Collector's Edition
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

name: Furi: Onnamusha
description: Rediscover Furi with the Onnamusha Rider: a powerful fighter that alternates between two stances: fast and agile or slower but lethal, until she's able to unleash the devastating power of the Star.

name: Trash Patrol: Academic Version
description: Trash Patrol is a local cooperative multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Break into a house, look for something to steal together with your raccoon friends. Don’t forget to wash and dry all items carefully! And watch out for the homeowner - They are not amused to see you within their home

name: Mapstermind
description: Compete with your friends in this 3v1 asymmetrical party game. Team up as one of the piecelings or wreak havoc as the Mapster in an exciting race against time!

name: Impossible Crime Book
description: This is a decryption class of interactive novel. One accident, two suicides. In order to prevent more innocent lives from being killed, you will be assigned to lurk on campus with your partner and find out the suspicious in different criminal cases.

name: Harmony Overture
description: When the world has gone silent, music finds a way. But when there is harmony there is discord. Interact, Fight, Dash, and Dodge your way through the dungeons filled with discourse and calamity to bring harmony back to your utopia.

name: Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion
description: The Jaws of the Lion DLC is the digital adaptation of the eponymous board game and expansion to Gloomhaven the critically acclaimed grim Tactictal RPG. Recruit 4 exclusive mercenaries and explore a new side of the world of Gloomhaven through an arching story filled with new enemies and bosses.

name: Tennis Manager 2022
description: Become a tennis manager. Manage your tennis academy and train the next tennis super stars. Even more realistic, with new players and updated potentials. Take the reins in 2022.

name: Dirtyblock
description: In Dirtyblock, the user needs to control a small platform. It moves across the entire lower part of the game space. The platform needs to constantly hit the ball to prevent it from falling. The main purpose of the application is to destroy all the bricks.

name: Be Funny Now!
description: Be Funny Now is the free-to-play competitive party game that pits your wit against the world! Write and draw your funniest answers to an ever-growing list of hundreds of questions and prompts such as “What really killed the dinosaurs?”, “What’s the Joker’s signature catchphrase?”, and “In just 4 words, ruin a first date!” Once everyone’s answers are in, judge your peers’ work with a shower of roses, a round of applause, or a flurry of tomatoes. Play with friends in private lobbies, or get started immediately in a public lobby for 2-8 player action. Stand out from the crowd with custom outfits, emotes, and more. And be sure to check out the daily prompt - a massive battle royale where everyone has 24 hours to answer the same question/prompt, then votes the best answers to the top where one winner will emerge victorious. Think you’re funny? Prove it…and Be Funny Now!

name: World Seed
description: A simple game with big ambitions. Fight creatures, explore the world and progress your character in this ever changing world.

name: Chicken Coop
description: Chicken Coop - Top Down View is a game where you have to beat eggs and provide yourself with offspring. Beat them in the right direction so that the chickens get their long-awaited eggs. Your work will be duly rewarded, happy chickens and lots of chickens.

name: PixelGround
description: The world's first large-scale battle survival battle has begun. Survive the survival stage where up to 40 people fight at the same time.

name: Hidden Objects Collection: Volume 2
description:
In Hidden Objects Collection: Volume 2 you get the following six hidden object games:
- 1912 Titanic Mystery
- Family Vacation California
- Family Vacation 2 Road Trip
- Mary Kay Andrews: The Fixer-Upper
- Emily Archer and the Cures of Tutankhamun
- The Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde

name: Kandra the Moonwalker
description: Kandra The Moonwalker is a 3D platformer demo inspired by the great classics of N64 and PlayStation. Find collectibles, explore different worlds, unlock habilities, and return magic to the world by recovering the magic feathers.

name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion - Lost Stories
description: Sin descripción

name: Heart of Dungeon
description: You are an adventurer. You are on a journey to King's Landing and are now escorting a merchant's wagon. Your companion, a competitor, has told you of a dungeon in the area. You may head there, or you may not. The choice is yours.

name: Witching Hour
description: Witching Hour is a horror story that takes you out of your family home and across the quiet town of Hollow Hills. Your fate depends on making difficult choices, your relationship with your family, and confrontations with the matriarch of the town’s affliction with witchcraft, Lucilia.

name: Little Witch in the Woods
description: Little Witch in the Woods tells the story of Ellie, an apprentice witch. Explore the mystical forest, help the charming residents, and experience the daily life of the witch.

name: Apex Legends Mobile
description:
Become a Champion anywhere with Apex Legends Mobile, a free-to-play mobile shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame & fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Master an ever-growing roster of diverse Legends, deep tactical squad play and bold new innovations that go beyond the Battle Royale experience. Legends change the game.

In Early 2023, EA it would be shutting down Apex Legends Mobile. Servers are expected to go offline on the 1st May 2023.

name: Enlisted: Calliope Squad
description:
This pack includes:

- A premium squad of tankers + T34 Calliope rocket tank (Rank, 5 USA)
- 400 Gold

name: Invisible Crush
description: A hard core arcade casual game.

name: Speaker of Worlds
description: Sin descripción

name: Lunchtime at Lilly's
description: Join Lilly for lunch!

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Glasshouse Set Bundle
description: Take complete control over a prison break with the Glasshouse Set Bundle of premium gear items and weapon skins. The Glasshouse Set Bundle is included in the Year 2 Pass, and the Gold Edition.

name: Room Before the Dark
description: A short horror game where you must retrieve items around the house for a bunny;

name: Dofense
description: Dofense is a Tower Defense RTS focused on the variety of strategies and maps. Defend the energy cores from ever increasing enemy waves by destroying their spawn gates. Build tower mazes on Hex grid. Adapt them to dynamic changes in the terrain. Face quirky bosses. Design your own levels and share them with others,

name: Frog Golf
description: Tired of games where they never let you play mini golf as a frog? Not even once? Yeah, we were too.

name: It's A Me
description: Poor Keke has gotten themselves in a pickle (several times?)! Guide Me through increasingly nasty obstacles while collecting coins in this tricky platformer. Controls are explained in-game; press Enter to start the game.

name: Untitled Roguelike
description: A tiny Broughlike for the Playdate!

name: Aurelia: Stellar Arising
description: Aurelia: Stellar Arising - 3D Turn-based Fleet vs. Fleet Space Combat Game. Choose between two factions and fight for control of the Aurelia System in over 77 missions per faction. Control fleets of up to 9 ships and give maneuver and tactical commands to each ship.

name: Weird Hat Fight
description: Weird Hat Fight is a party game where you use magical hats to fight your friends to the death.

name: Hatching
description: Hatching is a short retro-inspired, point-and-click virtual pet experience based on the Finnish horror film Hatching (2022).

name: Solitaire Game Christmas
description: Christmas is a time for fun winter games: throwing snowballs, secret Santa and… Solitaire! There are 12 reasons to play it!

name: Royal Jigsaw 2
description: New Royal Jigsaw, 700 unique puzzles - that's the choice of real kings! Collect all the photos and you'll see the greatest landscapes, famous castles and palaces of the world!

name: Cubic Lines
description: Sin descripción

name: My Name is Mayo 3
description: Get ready to have your intellect enriched, your emotions manipulated and your mayonnaise expanded; as you unveil the stories and learn from mistakes. Our lives are too short not to be enhanced with meaningful stories like this one!

name: MugenCards
description: Play MugenCards, an endless card game!

name: Raccoon Tales
description: Play as a raccoon in this stealth game where you steal, destroy and knock over trash cans in a variety of levels while eluding dangerous foes.

name: Delivery in Space
description: Delivery in Space is a relaxing puzzle game where you'll travel across the galaxy making deliveries to different planets. Black Hole, Nebula, Solar Storm and other wonders of outer space won't stop you on this journey! Prepare your spaceship and navigate using a card-based movement system.

name: Planetary Planter
description: Planetary Planter is an open-world farming game where, instead of farming normal plants, you grow celestial bodies while exploring an alien world.

name: Before the Last Hour
description: Play a unique rogue like game, mixing item and card games in an original post-apocalyptic universe. Explore, upgrade your equipment, fight unique monsters and bosses. And unlock all the secrets of the Before The Last Hour universe.

name: Little Witch
description: This is the story of an adventurous little witch and her cat in the paper world. The puzzle mainly tests the player's observation of the stage and the application of elements. Use the cat to eat the elements and use them in the right place to open the channel or get new elements.

name: GoRogue
description: GoRogue is First person shooter with multiplayer support.

name: Symbiotic
description: Symbiotic is a fast-paced, first-person roguelike shooter where you, an escaped prisoner, stole a real monster of a weapon: The Symbiote. Fight with an evolving weapon and escape!

name: Sunline
description: Sunline is a first-person 3D free-running game that follows Ana, a rebellious teen in the solarpunk city of Elyria, as she saves the city from a crushing storm.

name: Garage: Vamp
description: A visual novel by the esteemed smut artist hasselnut - garage:VAMP's premise is simple, you've got a hunky vampire living in your garage who is trying to fuck your wife. Will true love prevail, or will deep repressed desires become too much to bear?

name: Shelter 69
description: Expand your shelter in a unique take on the post-apocalypse genre, thrown straight into a wild world where women reign supreme across the wastelands. You are the last male, and all is for your taking.

name: Dungeon Fall
description: Dungeon Fall is a story-rich first chapter that begins the saga of Tales from Erda.

name: Orph: The Lost Boy
description: Orph - The Lost Boy is a first-person horror game where you have to find out what happened with your son. Explore an old orphanage, uncover secrets long forgotten, solve puzzles and don't forget to watch your back.

name: Spirit of the Island
description: Spirit of the Island is a colorful life simulation RPG set on a tropical paradise. Help the locals, grow crops, take care of animals, and turn a desolate archipelago into a prosperous tourist destination!

name: Omaze
description: Omaze is a circular puzzle platformer. An ode to circles. A hint to the never ending struggle against the perceived enemy.

name: Demon Quest '85
description: In Demon Quest '85 you play an ordinary, everyday kid with ordinary, everyday problems. You also have a magical book for summoning demons from the lowest circles of Hell so that they can help you be more popular at school.

name: One More Island
description: As the Queen's latest governor, build a colonial empire in Her name. Claim islands, collect their natural resources, build production chains, and turn a primitive outpost into a rebellious, bustling metropolis at the heart of a New World commercial empire!

name: Turrican Anthology Vol. 2
description:
Turrican Anthology Vol. 2 includes:

- Turrican 3 (Amiga)
- Mega Turrican (Mega Drive)
- Mega Turrican Director's Cut (Mega Drive)
- Super Turrican 2 (SNES)
- Super Turrican 1 Score Attack (SNES)
- 2 incredible soundtracks to choose from, the original game sound as well as the remaster studio track by Chris Huelsbeck.

name: Turrican Anthology Vol. 1
description:
Turrican Anthology Vol. 1 includes:

- Turrican (Amiga)
- Turrican 2 (Amiga)
- Super Turrican (SNES)
- Super Turrican Director's Cut (SNES)
- Mega Turrican Score Attack (Mega Drive)
- 2 incredible soundtracks to choose from, the original game sound as well as the remaster studio track by Chris Huelsbeck.

name: Zerograve
description: Pilot a nimble combat drone in zero gravity with six degrees of freedom. Blast your way through tons of robots and break apart huge bosses piece by piece. Unlock powerful weapons like the bouncing Zapper, brutal Chainsaw and overkill Missile Massacre.

name: Tau Defense
description: Defend your Qi and study Graphs. All you do is place towers and upgrade them, but when-and-where makes all the difference. Every battle can be won in multiple ways. Each variation in tactic is rewarded with its own trophy. When it's over you can see your strategy plotted with beautiful graphs.

name: I'd rather be fishing
description:
A Short sorta visual novel like game about what we do with our free time

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 106.

name: Cheesy Trials
description:
A devilish platform game for the 24K expanded Vic 20.

There are three experiments to complete, select one to play using the function keys (F1, F3, F5) or the action buttons on TheVic20's 'TheJoystick'. Can press these keys / buttons at any time to switch experiments without losing your progress.

The experiment main rooms reveal doorways to the trial rooms. Initially in each experiment you will see just the first trial room. Complete it to reveal more,

Control Echo the Mouse with a joystick and learn his abilities as you go. Hint, it is best to start with Experiment 1.

To beat a trial room collect a piece of cheese before the time runs out. You only have 5 seconds to do this between each cheese and more of the room is revealed. Sometimes there will be more than one cheese and your choice can drastically affect the room.

You have infinite clones but must be successful to proceed. If a trial room in one experiment is proving to be too challenging, jump over to one of the other experiments instead.

Complete the trials in all three experiments to win Echo's freedom.

name: Isis: The Fall
description:
Amidst centuries-long space conflict between the Alliance of Free Planets and the Neo-Terran Confederacy, allied cruiser FSS "Isis" is sent on a mission that could turn the tides of war. However, among it's crew, there's one officer that wants to pursue his own devious plan...
Isis: The Fall is a visual novel in which you follow one man's quest for revenge. Seven powerful female crew members of "Isis" are ripe for conquest; can you bring them to fall and save your homeland from another defeat?

name: Ignored and Humiliated by Gamer Girls
description: Hello, it's Aria. It seems some gamers are being cruel to me today and making me lick their feet!! How humiliating!!

name: House Hunted
description: A surreal visual novel style game about moving to a new town and considering home ownership.

name: Welcome to the World of ZJ the Ball
description: Sin descripción

name: GuessTheGame
description:
GuessThe.Game is a daily puzzle game inspired by Wordle, Heardle & Framed.wtf.

Every day a new game is selected and 6 screenshots from the game (some gameplay, some UI, some cutscenes - not guaranteed to strictly be gameplay!) are presented to you one at a time.

We try to have a selection of different games from different genres, eras, and platforms. We also try to have a mix of games that are well known and games that are more obscure. Generally our harder games are on the weekends, and our easier games are on weekdays.

name: Space 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Heardle 2
description:
A 2nd Mario Heardle that ran concurrently with the first, featuring different songs.
It ended on May 14th, 2023.

name: Into the Dungeon
description: Explore Dungeons, Solve Puzzles, Fight Monsters and collect some Loot!

name: To the Dragon Cave
description:
Liberate yourself from the throes of a powerful dragon, escape from a stone tower and wander hither and thither in the far-away land of Laudonia.
Not for a single moment will you be safe, that's for sure. Hordes of enemies lie in waiting at each step of your dangerous wanderings. Bloodthirsty sheep, giant spiders, skeletons, zombie trees and lots of other dark creatures strive to seize your soul.
You, however, are endowed with a mission that drives you forward. Therefore, you shall never give up.

name: Let's Go Baby! Suffocation
description: The journey in Let's Go! Baby! Friends World finally reaches its crescendo with Let's Go Baby! Suffocation, a standalone expansion / definitive edition combo that finally concludes the narrative running behind LGB:FW.

name: The Ferryman
description:
Keep your lantern to your chest, lad. These waters aren't as calm as they may seem...

As the Ferryman, it's your duty to deliver goods and supplies to the denizens of the sea. It isn't an easy job, but it needs doing. The Keepers depend on you, so you'd better get to it. Just remember - the further you stray from the shore, the rougher yet the seas become.

name: The Backroom Project
description: Scientists made a new discovery about the Backrooms. Noclipping out of bounds in normal reality was a myth for long, but now it can be reality! Now they are looking for subjects to test it on civil people. There are already scientists inside, so you have nothing to worry about, they say. Or do you?

name: The Jumping Burger
description:
Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Space Survival
description: This is a post-apocalyptic survival game that combines tower defense, survival, strategy, and random events. The game atmosphere is fun, and there are many wonderful props waiting for you to discover. Every decision you make will affect subsequent development. Live by your wisdom,

name: Ham Supi
description: Go your own way! !! There is no fixed path for this game! The way you want to go! An open world racing game where you can become a small hamster and run around freely.

name: Lost Alone Ep.2: Daddy
description:
George's mind journey continues in Lost Alone EP. 2 - Daddy.

George wakes up in a house that is familiar to him. He doesn't know what year it is. He doesn't know how he got into that house. Time and space lose all meaning. As his memory begins to come together, he realizes that he has ended up in his worst nightmare: his childhood!

name: Pokémon Ancestral X
description: Ancestral X is a difficulty hack of Pokémon X, built primarily for Nuzlocking, and otherwise inspired by popular hacks from Drayano, Buffel, and NotSuicuu. This is intended to be a truly challenging experience, but you’ll also find features common to enhancement hacks throughout. All 721 Pokémon are available, the leveling curve has been revamped, quality of life improvements are in place, and trainer battles are custom built and significantly harder. Best of all, Ancestral X introduces a number of features never before seen in Gen 6 hacks, including the ORAS Megas, Mobile PC, Trainer Natures, and Custom AI!

name: Now & Then: A Tale of the End
description:
Now & Then is the story of Jack (or a name of your choosing) Brooks, a widower who lives with his adopted daughter, Carol, during the aftermath of a global pandemic. Throughout the story, players witness the string of events that finds Jack adopting Carol and how they grow into a family unit before the collapse of civilized society. Influenced by Stephen King’s The Stand and numerous zombie movies and books, Now & Then is a tale of survivors learning to cope with life as it comes to them.

While the present is filled with tense moments as the Brooks family struggles with the challenges of the new normal, memories of the past provide a slice-of-life window as Jack tries to learn how to be a new father to a teenage girl.

name: The Night of Death
description: Sin descripción

name: Niveil: Red Riding Hood story
description: Old style fantasy platformer game.

name: Fire Emblem: Sacred Stones Plus
description: This ROM hack aims to take all the hacks from the Fire Emblem GBA hacking community and put them into the base game experience. These are designed for veteran players and newcomers alike! The changes are intended to be uncontroversial enough so that this isn’t seen as an “alternate” way to play the game but an “enhanced” way. The major changes are QoL and bug fixes.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC 2 Pack: Former Hell & Chireiden
description: Second expansion pack DLC for Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya’s

name: Kingdom of Drift
description: Sin descripción

name: Illumination
description: A mini-comic featuring The Botanist trying to fix the lights at his outpost.

name: Steam Engine
description: “Steam Engine” is an incremental game where you need to build industrial steam-powered machine in a retro futuristic style of technology.

name: Eger
description: "Eger" is a colorful and enjoyable side-scrolling 2D platform shooter. Insectoid aliens attacked our planet, and you ended up in a dense forest with no support.

name: Grandpa's Cheese
description: Grandpa has gone mad! collect the cheese and give them to Reeze so he can feed his mouse to get the hell out of the house!

name: Spearhead
description: Spearhead is the story of agents who join secret organizations in a chaotic world surrounded by infectious diseases. Experience the story of six agents joining.

name: Gamer Girls: Dating Sim
description: Date them all, win the girls over and unlock unique unique sex scenes! Gaming Girls: Dating Sim is a dating simulator with classic Tetris game. You should pass levels to see hot pictures with beautiful girls.

name: Happy Hops
description: Endless hopping fun! Relax and unwind by jumping between Lilly-pads to earn points. Earn bonus points for collecting lotus flowers. Collect enough to earn new high scores! Supports controllers and keyboard controls

name: Airport Administrator Simulator
description: In Airport Administrator Simulator you have the chance to know the smallest details of how a big airport works.

name: Maid Knight Alicia
description: Alicia is a female knight who has won many battles with her armor and sword. One day, a sorcerer she once let escape casts an curse of armor disablement on her. Now, only she can equip is a maid's uniform...

name: The Dead End
description: A Dungeon Survival RPG -- Play as a Salvager, an adventurer who specializes in rescuing others from a cursed dungeon that turns people into zombies.

name: Quake3Quest
description:
It's the real deal: Quake 3 in full VR. This port brings the frantic action of Q3:Arena to Virtual Reality.

Another Id-software classic brought to VR by Team Beef & Friends.

Features:

Frantic Single Player Campaign
Multiplayer in local wifi or online
Dedicated VR-only servers
Intuitive Weapons Selection
Fully Tracked Weapons
features additional mappacks via companion app
4 maps inlcuded, you can jump into action right away.
Unique Quest Home enviroment included (by Robyer1)
Use the Companion App for streamlined hd mod and mappack installation. The app is in "unknown sources". Use it to change your player name as well.

name: Hero King Quest: Peacemaker Prologue
description: A short "classic" JRPG. Play the role of the Dark Lord's sister, slay the Hero King, and take the first step in conquering humankind.

name: Demon Hunter: Shadow World
description: Demon hunter is an action-packed dark fantasy hack and slash game with an incredible combat system and awesome boss fights, assisted by a one of a kind character control mechanism and a perfect mix of RPG elements to make your adventure super immersive.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 06
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 6: Mini's Choice. Three kids hang out at a beach near the dawn of middle school. Mini's starting to realize what life as a Loser truly means.

name: The Princess Swap
description: The Princess Swap is the first and only book of The Princess Swap series.

name: Cambo: Webbed Fist
description:
There comes a time in every capybara's life when they must set peace aside and don the red headband of strength to become the Capybarbarian, protector of the waterways.

For Cambo, this is that time.

Use your webbed fists, foraging, and digging skills to defeat the invaders and reunite with Capybarbara. Keep fighting: In the end, either they die, or you do.

name: A Turnabout With Too Many Faces
description:
Four perfect strangers awaken in an empty hotel.
Trapped in a snowstorm, forgotten by the living and pitied by the dead, they are guided by the strange voice on the vinyl.

It appears they've found themselves in a game.
The rules are simple.
Frankly, they couldn't be simpler.

In four days, they shall be released.
There is only one instruction they must follow:

"Do not kill anyone."

name: Mayonnaise Simulator
description: Third person shooter with minor platforming. You have to eliminate the condiment threat.

name: Rolling in the Maze
description: In "Rolling in the Maze", players operate a small ball to challenge the maze. In order to reach the end, players need to crack according to the different level mechanisms of each level.

name: One Shot at Love
description:
Plagued by a series of losses, the Sea Dragons' only hope of regaining their footing is a new coach, that’s where you come in. As a former pro player, your insights could help lead the team to victory, but after cycling through so many unreliable mentors, many of the members are jaded and on guard.

Before you can even think about starting to train them, you’ll need to find a way to break through their icy barriers. Will your passion unite the team and lead them to victory, or are they doomed to fade from glory forever?

name: Zelda II: Ocarina of Time
description:
Ages ago, the Ancient Sages built the Temple of Time to protect the Sacred Realm. Ganondorf, the Gerudo King of Thieves, has Obtained the Triforce of Power and become the King of Evil. The power of the sages lies sleeping in six temples across Hyrule. The time has come for you to awaken as the Hero of Time!

This adaptation takes Link to familiar places and a few new ones. It is designed to be more difficult, more forgiving, and less linear than the vanilla game.

name: Creature Discomfort
description: Adventure game with an inventory and puzzles that are not very hard.

name: Evil Dead: The Game - The Classics Bundle
description: Go old school with The Classic Bundle for Evil Dead: The Game in a variety of outfits that take the team back to their roots, along with some fiery demonic outfits.

name: Kiddy Memory
description:
This memory game, or Memotest, for kids is a Memorama designed to play with the family. This memory match is also ideal for adults that want to excercise their brain and memory.

On 3 types of difficulties, made of 60 levels, with cards spawning random so you never play the same game, you'll enjoy hours and fun in family and let your kids develop without efforts their memory.

name: Minecraft: Angry Birds
description: The Pigs are back to their old tricks, and it's up to you to stop them! Playing as Red, Chuck, Bomb, and other members of The Flock, your mission is to rescue your friends, save the eggs, and stop the pesky Pigs' grand plans. With each rescued bird, you'll unlock a new playable character with unique skills to help you pop more Pigs and topple more towers!

name: Crabada
description: Crabada is an idle game available on most native platforms. Earn in-game rewards in exciting, idle gameplay as you send your Crabada NFTs to Battle for riches and glory!

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Universe Pack
description:
Battle it out in Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl with three additional brawlers at a great value! Best your foes in the fray with each of these three brawlers and their completely unique moves that are inspired directly from their shows!

This pack features:
• Jenny Wakeman, aka XJ-9, from My Life as a Teenage Robot
• Hugh Neutron from Jimmy Neutron
• Rocko from Rocko's Modern Life
• ... each with a unique stage and alternate costume!

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Jenny
description: Buy the Jenny Pack to unlock the state-of-the-art protagonist from My Life as a Teenage Robot. Available Now. Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl game required; sold separately.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Swingers Party
description: Challenging jigsaw puzzles, featuring adult images of 2 couples at a swingers party on a yacht.

name: PMFighter
description: PMFighter is a fighting game inspired by Punch Out that is based around the 2022 Australian election.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Deluxe Edition
description: Alongside the base game our bundle provides you with the Deluxe Theme Pack. The DLC includes nice gifts: 10 seeds and 100 coins, you can also change the colors of your world. Upgrade your orchard Sell your apples to earn money and improve your orchard. …

name: Supaplex
description: Millions of people around the world have already experienced this joyful adventure! Help Murphy to travel through hundreds of the most diverse game levels! - 111 INCREDIBLY EXCITING LEVELS! Help Murphy beat them all! Collect Infotrons, dodge Zonks, escap…

name: Coloring Pixels: Mythology 2 Pack
description: This Mythology 2 Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image depicts different Characters and Moments from Ancient Mythology from various cultures! The second book of its kind to let you visit the legends of old!

name: Horror Run
description: Horror Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your epic run as a Werewolf in the night.

name: Minemadness
description: A game that innovates the way you can find (sometimes not) mines in a field, through clues given by numbers and your own logical reasoning, train, win and share your scores with your friends and the whole world, Minemadness offers 4 game modes: Classic, Madness, Training and Custom.

name: Redemption Cemetery: The Stolen Time - Collector's Edition
description: After a terrible accident, you wake to find yourself in another realm! A dangerous entity threatens to destroy the constructs of time itself, taking humanity into darkness along with it! Do you have what it takes to save the world before it’s too late?

name: Salad Bar Tycoon: Extended Edition
description: Look out, this awesome salad bar will soon become the best one in town! Become the manager of a salad bar and learn for yourself just how hard it can be. Be careful not to mix up your recipes!

name: Molecule Make Lab
description: Molecule Maker Lab is a puzzle game about chemicals with futuristic and minimalist themes. Rotate and arrange the atoms in the correct position until you form a beautiful molecule.

name: Project Crypt
description: Project Crypt: The horror adventure about escaping a city overrun by monsters.

name: Long Journey
description: Long journey - Many people know that a large amount of sweets is bad for teeth .. But not for this skeleton! Embark on a long adventure with this skinny sweet tooth and collect all the donuts!
